react4j.arez

Class ReactArezComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • react4j.Component
      • react4j.arez.ReactArezComponent

  • public abstract class ReactArezComponent
extends Component
    A base class for all Arez enabled components. This class makes the component rendering reactive and it will schedule a re-render any time any of the observable entities accessed within the scope of the render method are changed.

    To achieve this goal, the props and state of the component are converted into observable properties. This of course means they must be accessed within the scope of an Arez transaction. (Typically this means it needs to be accessed within the scope of a Action annotated method or within the scope of the render method.

      • hasRenderDepsChanged

        protected final boolean hasRenderDepsChanged()
        Return true if the render dependencies have been marked as changed and component has yet to be re-rendered.
        Returns:
        true if render dependencies changed, false otherwise.

      • onRenderDepsChange

        @OnDepsChange
protected final void onRenderDepsChange()
        Hook used by Arez to notify component that it needs to be re-rendered.

      • getContext

        @ContextRef
 @Nonnull
protected abstract ArezContext getContext()
        Return the arez context that this component is associated with. The component is associated with the context that was active when it was created and can only react to observables associated with the same context.
        Returns:
        the arez context that this component is associated with.

      • performRender

        protected final ReactNode performRender()
        Wrapper method that delegates to the Component.render() method. This method exists to give middleware a mechanism to hook into component lifecycle step.
        Overrides:
        performRender in class Component
        Returns:
        the result of rendering.

      • anyPropsDisposed

        protected boolean anyPropsDisposed()
        Return true if any prop is an ArezComponent that has been disposed. This is used to guard against rendering a react component that has invalid props.
        Returns:
        true if any prop is an ArezComponent that has been disposed.

      • trackRender

        @Observe(executor=APPLICATION,
         name="render",
         priority=LOW,
         observeLowerPriorityDependencies=true,
         reportResult=false)
 @Nullable
protected ReactNode trackRender()
        This method is the method enhanced by arez that performs render and tracks dependencies. This SHOULD NOT be merged with performRender() as then the isDisposed check will be present in every instance of render method which can result in unnecessary code bloat.
        Returns:
        the result of rendering.

      • performComponentWillUnmount

        protected final void performComponentWillUnmount()
        Wrapper method that delegates to the Component.componentWillUnmount() method. This method exists to give middleware a mechanism to hook into component lifecycle step.
        Overrides:
        performComponentWillUnmount in class Component
